channel.title: Ownership on mgb
channel.description: Recent content in Ownership on mgb

item.title: More than a Software Engineer
item.description: For the last couple of months, I’ve been working on a Multi-Tenant Architecture at Rewaa. And for the last couple of weeks, I’ve been working on some core architectural changes specifically on the Database side. Recently I had to write a solution, where we had to expect a downtime of a few hours. We will have to change that — software engineers always find a way out of anywhere, it’s just a matter of trade-offs.
